page.title: 08HOME LIFE Roles in the house
page.content: {cleaning }: 76 : 10 : 03 : : : {tidying }: 56 : 03 : 27 : : : {cooking }: 75 : 09 : 01 : : : {gardening }: 43 : 39 : 11 : : : {laying table }: 24 : 15 : 44 : : : {"do it yourself" }: 46 : 21 : 11 : : : {lighting coal fire:} 26 : 45 : 11 {:mother:father:child Numbers show which member of the family usually performs which tasks. {cleaning,}washing dishes etc..{ {tidying,}making beds etc..{ {cooking,}meal preparation.{ {gardening,}indoor and outdoor. {do it yourself,}general maintenance. {lighting coal fire.}92% have coal fire
